content: Wild Flower taking a break and coming back for hugs… ❤ We loVe yoU, Wild Flower… From our home to yours we send you love, cheek-kisses and hugs-hugs-hugs, and a few more hugs, so you know beyond any fear of disbelief that you are loved; not just by us, but by many, many and more! Peace to you Sister.❤ M n S*
